overview: Charilaos Maraziotis owns a store and owes so much money both to his lenders and to the state, that he is in danger of going to jail. He decides to pretend to be a psychopath and is sent to an asylum. His lenders, upon hearing the news about his mental health, change their attitude towards him and release him from his debts.

production_companies.name: Afoi Roussopouloi-G. Lazaridis - D. Sarris - K. Psarras

title: Eftyhos... trellathika!
